name: Tandoori Paratha Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Tandoori Paratha Recipe: Flour 2 cups Egg 1 Salt ½ tsp Oil ¼ cup Yeast1 ½ tspSugar1 tbsp Ghee for frying Flour 2 cups Egg 1 Salt ½ tsp Oil ¼ cup Yeast 1 ½ tsp Sugar 1 tbsp Ghee for frying
instructions: Knead all above into a medium soft dough. Leave to rise for 1 hour, make into 4 bowls, roll into quarter plate size, apply ghee, sprinkle flour, roll into Swiss roll, form into a paera, again roll lightly. Shallow fry on tawa.
